name: folder-navigator
description: Quickly navigate to folders in your vault using fuzzy search.

scripts.build: npm run prettier && node esbuild.config.mjs production && copy manifest.json build\ && if exist styles.css (copy styles.css build\)
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && gh release create "v%npm_package_version%" --notes-file CHANGELOG.md --draft build/main.js build/manifest.json build/styles.css

author: wenlzhang
